name: handle-ofx
description: Handle OFX files on S3 and load to DB
author: Gareth Dyson <4315423+dysonic@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.dev: npm run zip && npm run s3 && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name handleOFX --s3-bucket dysonic-dev-misc --s3-key handle-ofx.zip --no-cli-pager
